summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3609, for the improvement of 55th Avenue Southwest, from Alki Avenue to a point 700 feet south thereof; under Ordinance No. 44633, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
